description: Simulate the execution of an Authorizer in your RestApi with headers, parameters, and an incoming request body.

parameters.name: restApiId
parameters.description: The string identifier of the associated RestApi.

parameters.name: authorizerId
parameters.description: Specifies a test invoke authorizer request's Authorizer ID.

parameters.name: headers
parameters.description: A key-value map of headers to simulate an incoming invocation request. This is where the incoming authorization token, or identity source, should be specified. (string) --- (string) ---

parameters.name: multiValueHeaders
parameters.description: The headers as a map from string to list of values to simulate an incoming invocation request. This is where the incoming authorization token, or identity source, may be specified. (string) --- (list) --- (string) ---

parameters.name: stageVariables
parameters.description: A key-value map of stage variables to simulate an invocation on a deployed Stage. (string) --- (string) ---

parameters.name: additionalContext
parameters.description: A key-value map of additional context variables. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_items.name: clientStatus
nested_items.description: The HTTP status code that the client would have received. Value is 0 if the authorizer succeeded.

nested_items.name: log
nested_items.description: The API Gateway execution log for the test authorizer request.

nested_items.name: latency
nested_items.description: The execution latency, in ms, of the test authorizer request.

nested_items.name: principalId
nested_items.description: The principal identity returned by the Authorizer.

nested_items.name: policy
nested_items.description: The JSON policy document returned by the Authorizer.
